description.translate: Pure creativity is only possible with absolute freedom and a limitless mind.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6L'emprise de l'artiste\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aLa créativité pure n'est envisageable qu'à la faveur \"}","{\"text\":\"§ad'une liberté absolue et d'un esprit sans limite.\"}","{\"text\":\"§aPure creativity is only possible with\"}","{\"text\":\"§aabsolute freedom and a limitless mind.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7SPD§a3 §7DAR§a2\"}"]}}
